SELECT "Item As-Is"."Group Number"
  FROM "Retail Merchandising Analytics As-Is"."Item As-Is"
WHERE 
  (
         
		( '@{Busmr}'='FOOD RETAIL'
       AND "Item As-Is"."Group Number" IN (1010, 1020, 1030, 1040, 1050, 1060, 1510, 1520, 1530, 1540, 2010, 2020, 2030, 2040, 2050, 2060, 2070, 5520, 5530, 6010, 8040, 8510, 8530, 8540, 8550, 8560, 8570, 8580, 8590)
         )
	  OR
	  ('@{Busmr}'='GENMERCH'
	  AND "Item As-Is"."Group Number" IN (5510, 6570, 9510, 9520, 9530,2510, 2520, 2530, 2540, 2550, 2560, 2570, 2580, 2590, 3010, 3020, 3030, 3040, 3050, 3060, 3080, 6510, 6520, 6530, 6540, 6550, 6560, 6580, 7550, 3510, 3520, 3530, 3540, 3550, 3560, 3580, 3590, 4020, 4510, 4520, 4540, 4550, 4560, 4570, 5010, 5020, 5030, 5040, 5050, 7010, 7020, 7030, 7040, 7050, 7060, 7070, 7080, 8010, 8020, 8030, 8520, 9010, 9020, 9030, 9040)
	  )	
	  OR
	  ('@{Busmr}'='All Column Values'
	  AND "Item As-Is"."Group Number" IN (5510, 6570, 9510, 9520, 9530,2510, 2520, 2530, 2540, 2550, 2560, 2570, 2580, 2590, 3010, 3020, 3030, 3040, 3050, 3060, 3080, 6510, 6520, 6530, 6540, 6550, 6560, 6580, 7550, 3510, 3520, 3530, 3540, 3550, 3560, 3580, 3590, 4020, 4510, 4520, 4540, 4550, 4560, 4570, 5010, 5020, 5030, 5040, 5050, 7010, 7020, 7030, 7040, 7050, 7060, 7070, 7080, 8010, 8020, 8030, 8520, 9010, 9020, 9030, 9040, 1010, 1020, 1030, 1040, 1050, 1060, 1510, 1520, 1530, 1540, 2010, 2020, 2030, 2040, 2050, 2060, 2070, 5520, 5530, 6010, 8040, 8510, 8530, 8540, 8550, 8560, 8570, 8580, 8590)
	  )
   )
